CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 4,5 Although remarkable progress has been made in the design and synthesis of p - type polymer semiconductors , their performances in terms of hole mobilities and photovoltaic properties remain to be further optimized and maximized.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| p - type polymer semiconductors |

Explanation:

The material name entity in the paragraph is "p - type polymer semiconductors" as it is a specific type of material with unique properties.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| p - type polymer semiconductors |

Explanation:

The only material name entity in the paragraph is "p - type polymer semiconductors" as it is a specific type of material with unique properties. The other terms in the paragraph, such as "hole mobilities" and "photovoltaic properties," refer to properties or characteristics of materials, not the materials themselves.

| photovoltaic properties |

The other term, "remarkable progress," is not a material property, but rather a description of the progress made in the field.
